fix.after:
match detectorName:
    case 'SilentDetector':
        myDetector = SilentTestDetector()
    case 'AlertingDetector':
        myDetector = AlertingTestDetector(priority)
    case 'HaltingDetector':
        myDetector = HaltingTestDetector()
    case 'RaiseErrorDetector':
        myDetector = RaiseErrorTestDetector()
